title: Beachfront Pool Suite Stay Overlooking A World-Class Surf Break
description: Blessed with mesmerising views of the world-famous Keramas surf break with pristine volcanic beachfront, your beachfront pool suite at Komune Resort & Beach Club is the perfect place to enjoy a dip in your private pool and watch the sunrise over the ocean. Unwind with daily breakfast, two indulgent Balinese massages per room, two romantic dinners, daily meditation sessions, two-night surfing sessions, unlimited daily yoga or fitness training, free kids club and one-way airport drop-off at the resort.
offer_address: Pantai Keramas St, Medahan, Blahbatuh, Gianyar, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Contemporary Bali Beach Escape Overlooking Renowned Surf Break
description: Discover absolute serenity at Hotel Komune and Beach Club Bali located on one of the worldâ€™s premier surf breaks on the island's east coast. Savour a delicious meal alongside fresh ocean breezes at the open-air Health Hub restaurant, take a break at the indulgent spa or escape the heat with a refreshing dip in the pool. Later, explore the volcanic beachfront, reinvigorate your mind, body and soul in the yoga pavilions or follow the winding paths to the mighty Keramas surf breaks.
location_description: Hotel Komune and Beach Club Bali
offer_address: Pantai Keramas Street, Medahan, Blahbatuh, Gianyar Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
